title: Saint-loup
author: Saint-loup
created_time: October 30, 2022, 10:50:39 PMLast edit: October 31, 2022, 09:13:19 AM by Saint-loup
content: Which songs are you listening when you play slots or table games at casinos, or when you place bets on sportsbooks ?Feel free to paste links toward youtube, spotify or whatever platform to make it known to us.(If you don't listen specific music when you gamble, you don't need to write it here, thanks)

comments.author: len01
comments.body: some old songs that i played while gambling.even though it's an old song but it calms my mind and focuses on gamblinghttps://youtu.be/TfvAStsJBEMhttps://youtu.be/w46bWxS9IjYhttps://youtu.be/XjFsZj1aHowhttps://youtu.be/PxeIxFSMJn4https://youtu.be/Xs8fLdVwwzwhttps://youtu.be/v3xwCkhmiesand many more.but that's what i always play many times when gambling. the atmosphere when gambling becomes calm

comments.author: QueenVera
comments.body: My kind of music depends on the kind of game and it's result.When in a winning state, possibly on my first five plays, then I losten to songs from pop smoke.That dude, get my soul really high when staying positive.In situations when I'm struggling to get a winning balance, I listen to some gospel music from basically choirs bands( just play any choir band songs) and I'm good.There are days I make massive loses, I just lay down low, with a big jar of beer and some cool blues saves the moment.

comments.author: electronicash
comments.body: The Winner Takes It All by ABBA. i don't see it having difference whether there is background music or not. but i'd write it anyway because when it comes to gambling this song always comes in my mind. losing more money is like no more ace to play. this is kind of a gamblers song actually when you read the message on the lyrics. not all sort of a love song.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: Listening to old songs with a slow tempo is quite fun like the song Fly me to the moon by Frank Sinatra often also hear this song and some old songs, but sometimes change it to hear songs or music from local artists with the local language of my country or listening cover songs from guitar instrumental, so I'm very random.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: For those who were born during this era:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JRDgihVDEko - Dire Straight's Money for NothingQuoteMoney for nothin' and your chicks for freeMoney for nothin', chicks for freeGet your money for nothin' and your chicks for freeOoh, money for nothin', chicks for freeThis is what I play when I go online play with my favorite slots or even baccarat or roulette.Really bad ass and you can literally sing the songs specially if you hit a massive run, hehehe.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: It really depends on my mood, but when I feel relaxed while playing I usually go for binaural music, I get so excited when playing that I need relaxing music to control my emotion and it really works, not only while playing but also when I need to feel relaxed after my office work.This is one example of Binaural music I listen to, the music lasted from  2 hours to 5 hourshttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LFGsZ6ythQQ

comments.author: Ondekinecakabilirim
comments.body: Sometimes I listen to this song while playing games of chance. Because it excites me.1. Johnny Marr - Easy Money In fact, classical music is not always my first choice. But sometimes I listen to classical music while betting on sports games. It relaxes my soul and makes my decisions healthier. I think betting platforms should provide music service. I guess this is a service related to social activity. If they provide such a service, they can differentiate themselves from their competitors. I would prefer betting platforms that recommend good music to me. 1. Chopin - Spring Waltz (Mariage d'Amour) [Please Read Description]2. Vivaldi: Nisi Dominus (Cum dederit) - Jaroussky3. Badinerie - Johann Sebastian Bach4. Turkish March Mozart - Rondo Alla Turca

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: While other loves to listen to their favorite rockstar or singers I love listening to rain and thunderstorm while my aircon is on the coolest it keeps me more focused just the thought that there is thunderstorm and rain outside it made me feel play longer, there are so many of these on Youtube and this is one of my favorites, after the video, I felt sleepy and that's the time to rest or to take time out from my session https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y615vOsiG5w

comments.author: Doell
comments.body: When gambling I often listen to old music as Queen songs but when losing is different I definitely change listening to piano instruments the sound of water. Example https://youtu.be/77ZozI0rw7w Sometimes helps to calm excessive adrenaline, music in my opinion is like a diversion of tension, if gambling atmosphere is getting tense it must be relaxed.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: QueenVera on October 31, 2022, 03:24:08 AMMy kind of music depends on the kind of game and it's result.When in a winning state, possibly on my first five plays, then I losten to songs from pop smoke.That dude, get my soul really high when staying positive.In situations when I'm struggling to get a winning balance, I listen to some gospel music from basically choirs bands( just play any choir band songs) and I'm good.There are days I make massive loses, I just lay down low, with a big jar of beer and some cool blues saves the moment.Any slow music, rhythm and blues preferably when I am playing. My soul would be attracted to some rap music blended with R&B from rappers from the West Coast in the US. The lines of JayZ, 2Pac, Bone Thugs en Harmony, would be good for the soul. But when I am loosing I prefer silence, no music. Its time for mediation and concentration. If the day is a bad one, I would prefer to go home and listen to some romantic blues by Donnell Jones, Babyface, Brain McKnight, Maroon 5 or Mario Winans. But if it is a good one, the West Coast rappers would still occupy the stage of my soul.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: I thought I was the only one. My current favorite playlist now to listen to is linked below. https://open.spotify.com/playlist/2bZtnBtD2lZhNncOhgcaGr?si=e5fa51213c4447c9It is very suitable for the feels and gambling. I feel like it makes me feel lucky when gambling. It's like framing you to the right mindset and it just goes into your feels and possibly results in a positive outcome lol.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: Not just when gambling because I always listen to them. Even while analyzing the game, when it comes to sports betting and playing poker. Linkin Park, every album of them. Sometimes just the full playlist of 90's alternative rock. The thing on Youtube where you only see the playlist picture and the quality of sound is better or louder, I think. It's like a routine habit to play it at whatever I do (unless I am watching) because it brings more energy to me.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: It depends on my mood and the game I'm playing when it comes to dice and crash I usually go for '90s hip hops like the music of Vanilla Ice, Beasty Boys, and MC Hammer, I like these kinds of music with fast tempos very much suited to what I'm playing, but after my session and I need to get down to my excitement I like to slow down music coming from our local artist.Listening to music that you like while playing will make you focus more on your game, you just need a good headphone, with a good bass.

comments.author: Jemzx00
comments.body: When playing Slot and Dice games, I prefer to play calming songs just like back when I was studying such as Lofi music that usually doesn't have any lyrics on it. I also, like to play some old songs like "The Beatles" and "Queen". It helps that the songs are calm as I am more focused on my games and do not get too excited when winning or losing. Other than those, I also listen to local slow hip-hop and R&B songs. I never play any music that is too tense like rock&roll and fast rap songs.Lofi Music on youtube:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jfKfPfyJRdkThis is The Beatles on Spotify:https://open.spotify.com/playlist/37i9dQZF1DZ06evO2iBPiw?si=696b85061e164d16

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Quote from: sotoshihero on October 31, 2022, 11:15:11 AMI would rather listen to instrumental music but in a very slow tune.Too loud could be a distraction which you cannot concentrate. I enjoy listening to instrumental melodies while sipping coffee ☺️Feels like a distraction for me also but since I only play dice and slot these days with the coins I get from faucets like in the Betfury, I turn on the radio where sometimes it plays old songs. The instrumental band that I found amusing is the Menahan Street Band, saxophone improvisation sound is soothing as much as the blues.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: Pretty much with the likes of jazz, blues, deep house, tomorrowland music but pretty much random as long as it's vibing the current mood. There are lot of genres I can listen to but maybe deep house is what I can relate to and they are calm to my ears.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: Quote from: Saint-loup on October 30, 2022, 10:50:39 PMWhich songs are you listening when you play slots or table games at casinos, or when you place bets on sportsbooks ?Feel free to paste links toward youtube, spotify or whatever platform to make it known to us.(If you don't listen specific music when you gamble, you don't need to write it here, thanks)Listening to music is among one of my hobbies, when gambling,I love listening to old 90s hip hop mix. This make me feel real good when am winning or losing because I gamble for fun,so if I don't listen to music it is no longer be that too entertaining. If I win big,I will high the volume to the max and I might just start parting on a low key.There is this Africa artist I love listening to his song too,if am not listening to hip hop I will listen to his songs. He is an afro beat singer Fela Anikulapo Kuti,though he is late but his songs are my type of song as it inspires me so much when gambling in winning.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: I listened to a song from Bon Jovi, It's My Life and more from them as I like their songs. Sometimes, I also listen to old songs from Whitney Houston, Queen ( We Are The Champion ), Prince Universe and others.But I also often don't listen to music because I want to enjoy the gambling moment in my room, especially at night when everyone is asleep. And if I really wanted to hear a song, it might be Beethoven's instrumental songs.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: I like old songs, example of some songs I listen to when I'm doing sports analysis:George Michael (Careless Whisper)michael boltonMichael JacksonI also like electronic music, and styles of music from Africa, I believe that when I listen to music while doing sports analysis I calm down and don't keep thinking about negative things like what will happen if I lose
